Class Erststimme

  • java.lang.Object
    • Erststimme

  • public class Erststimme
extends java.lang.Object
    accesses remote json data at abgeordnetenwatch.de or local for retrieving information about the candidates of a parliament if local, the parliament data is all contained in src/resources/parliament2profile.json if remote the json file is mapped after creating the url. For creating the url the parliamentName is necessary. It is possible to call the Erststimme to receive a SpeechletResponse including a answer to a political context for Alexa output A context is called subGroup and they have common top level Groups. Mapping is done via class Themen, which has a GroupMapping attribute. A question includes answer and subGruop, which is called category according to json profile of abgeordnetenwatch.de A Klient instance is created with a subGruop and used with a url for retrieving the answer to a questions from this context.
    Version:
    1.0, 15.9.2017
    Author:
    Rainer Wichmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Erststimme(java.lang.String parliamentName, GroupMapping mapping)
      Creates a Erststimme by setting Attribs: mapSubGroupsToGroup, String getDataUrl1, String getDataUrl2 , Parliament parliament, parliamentProfile and stores the profiles of the Parliament in profiles.json locally

    • Constructor Detail

      • Erststimme

        public Erststimme(java.lang.String parliamentName,
                  GroupMapping mapping)
           throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Creates a Erststimme by setting Attribs: mapSubGroupsToGroup, String getDataUrl1, String getDataUrl2 , Parliament parliament, parliamentProfile and stores the profiles of the Parliament in profiles.json locally
        Parameters:
        parliamentName - type String, Name of parliament as used in abgeordnetenwatch.de, mainly necessary for accessing parliament2profile.json from remote to create url
        mapping - GroupMapping of political contexts, created in class Themen
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if url is not correct, when accessing parliament2profile object remotely
        java.io.IOException - if Scanner cannot read src/resources/parliament2profile.json
